Contact us

info@measurement33.com
+971 52 8612284

Measurement 33 is not just another shoe brand. It's a new label that reflects the spirit of the third millennium woman - confident, brave and determined.

We want all women to be happy as they chart their own path to success, without ever having to compromise or accept second best.

At M33 we produce comfortable beautiful premium shoes for women with small feet, so they can focus on other important things in their lives. Our shoes mean there's no need to compromise on beauty or comfort anymore.

Why compromise if you can have it all?

Look more

Made from the finest quality materials, our high-heel shoes offer all M33 customers the perfect combination of beauty, style and comfort.

We invest a lot of time, energy and dedication into producing every pair to ensure you are comfortable, and have the support to enjoy your life.

Our shoes are always in a good mood, and we want you to be, too.

I'll tell you a secret. I have tiny feet. Size 33, or UK size 1. When I was younger I thought there was something wrong with me. But then I discovered so many other women who have small feet and face the same challenges. I was always having to wear trainers, numerous insoles, shopping in the children's sections, settling for something average, and constantly searching for a pair of shoes I liked.

The first time I owned a pair of pretty heels was when I started making enough money to order a custom-made pair. And then I thought that if there are so many women with small feet, why do we continue to suffer?

The Idea to create my own shoe label is something that has lived inside me for years, until I had the confidence to take the plunge. About a year ago, I left a stable job and was searching for my life's purpose. While meditating, a thought landed in my head: “Perhaps it is my mission to make women like me happy?” You can guess how I decided to achieve this mission.

As a spiritual healer, I am not just producing shoes, but sharing my aura and energy with every customer. I believe that owning a pair of my M33 shoes will have a positive impact on the lives of women with small feet. Are you ready to believe this as well?

© 2021 MEASuREMENT THIRTY THREE
